!define.description: Usage: !define [/ifndef | /redef] ([/date|/utcdate] symbol [value]) | (/file symbol filename) | (/math symbol val1 OP val2)

CreateFont.description: Usage: CreateFont $(user_var: handle output) face_name [height weight /ITALIC /UNDERLINE /STRIKE]

EnumRegKey.description: Usage: EnumRegKey $(user_var: output) rootkey subkey index

EnumRegValue.description: Usage: EnumRegValue $(user_var: output) rootkey subkey index

FileErrorText.description: Usage: FileErrorText [text (can contain $0)] [text without ignore (can contain $0)]

FileOpen.description: Usage: FileOpen $(user_var: handle output) filename openmode

FileRead.description: Usage: FileRead $(user_var: handle input) $(user_var: text output) [maxlen]

FileReadByte.description: Usage: FileReadByte $(user_var: handle input) $(user_var: bytevalue output)

FileReadUTF16LE.description: Usage: FileReadUTF16LE $(user_var: handle input) $(user_var: text output) [maxlen]

FileReadWord.description: Usage: FileReadWord $(user_var: handle input) $(user_var: wordvalue output)

FileSeek.description: Usage: FileSeek $(user_var: handle input) offset [mode] [$(user_var: new position output)]

FindFirst.description: Usage: FindFirst $(user_var: handle output) $(user_var: filename output) filespec

FindNext.description: Usage: FindNext $(user_var: handle input) $(user_var: filename output)

GetDLLVersion.description: Usage: GetDLLVersion filename $(user_var: high output) $(user_var: low output)

GetDLLVersionLocal.description: Usage: GetDLLVersionLocal localfilename $(user_var: high output) $(user_var: low output)

GetDlgItem.description: Usage: GetDlgItem $(user_var: handle output) dialog item_id

GetFileTime.description: Usage: GetFileTime file $(user_var: high output) $(user_var: low output)

GetFileTimeLocal.description: Usage: GetFileTimeLocal localfile $(user_var: high output) $(user_var: low output)

MessageBox.description: Usage: MessageBox mode messagebox_text [/SD return] [return_check label_to_goto_if_equal [return_check2 label2]]

MessageBox MB_ABORTRETRYIGNORE.description: Usage: MessageBox mode messagebox_text [/SD return] [return_check label_to_goto_if_equal [return_check2 label2]]

MessageBox MB_OK.description: Usage: MessageBox mode messagebox_text [/SD return] [return_check label_to_goto_if_equal [return_check2 label2]]

MessageBox MB_OKCANCEL.description: Usage: MessageBox mode messagebox_text [/SD return] [return_check label_to_goto_if_equal [return_check2 label2]]

MessageBox MB_RETRYCANCEL.description: Usage: MessageBox mode messagebox_text [/SD return] [return_check label_to_goto_if_equal [return_check2 label2]]

MessageBox MB_YESNO.description: Usage: MessageBox mode messagebox_text [/SD return] [return_check label_to_goto_if_equal [return_check2 label2]]

MessageBox MB_YESNOCANCEL.description: Usage: MessageBox mode messagebox_text [/SD return] [return_check label_to_goto_if_equal [return_check2 label2]]

MiscButtonText.description: Usage: MiscButtonText [back button text] [next button text] [cancel button text] [close button text]

ReadINIStr.description: Usage: ReadINIStr $(user_var: output) ini_file section entry_name

ReadRegDWORD.description: Usage: ReadRegDWORD $(user_var: output) rootkey subkey entry

ReadRegStr.description: Usage: ReadRegStr $(user_var: output) rootkey subkey entry

SendMessage.description: Usage: SendMessage hwnd message [wparam|STR:wParam] [lparam|STR:lParam] [$(user_var: return value)] [/TIMEOUT=X]

SpaceTexts.description: Usage: SpaceTexts none | ([space required text] [space available text])

WriteINIStr.description: Usage: WriteINIStr ini_file section_name entry_name new_value

WriteRegBin.description: Usage: WriteRegBin rootkey subkey entry_name hex_string_like_12848412AB

WriteRegDWORD.description: Usage: WriteRegDWORD rootkey subkey entry_name new_value_dword

WriteRegExpandStr.description: Usage: WriteRegExpandStr rootkey subkey entry_name new_value_string

WriteRegStr.description: Usage: WriteRegStr rootkey subkey entry_name new_value_string
